text:
No no need to apologise - i've been in delivery and working like crazy myself and trying to keep on top of replying on here haha!

I think the reference thing is a very good question - i guess its like Fx in that i've seen great examples of Fx next to the Reference, though usually more for juniors / RnD as once you're senior its just the finished shots. Maybe you can find the modellers you aspire to and see what they do in terms of showing the work
i can swing the helicopter question past my friend again and see if he's tackled that kind of model before :slightly_smiling_face:
